title: Installation issue: openblas
body:
Hi,

Sorry to bother you all, in an updated macOS machine (Catalina 10.15.4) and spack installation, I am finding this issue when trying to instal openBLAS.

I am not sure if I am doing something wrong in my installation.
And I think a similar one is described here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/59674, but I don't understand how to proceed for doing an identical workaround for installing openBLAS.

Do you have any suggestion?
I will open an issue in openBLAS referring to this one, in case the solution can come from their side.

Thank you again for all your help,
Diana

```console
$ spack install openblas
==> Warning: clang@11.0.3-apple cannot build optimized binaries for "skylake". Using best target possible: "x86_64"
==> 60422: Installing openblas
==> Warning: microarchitecture specific optimizations are not supported yet on mixed compiler toolchains [check clang@11.0.3-apple for further details]
==> Fetching https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/archive/v0.3.9.tar.gz
```
